job.title: Staff - Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongPosition Titlestrongnbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp  Staff Data Scientist ppstrongPositionnbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbspnbspstrongFull Time Exempt ppstrongSupervises Staffstrongnbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp No ppstrongSalary Rangestrongnbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp nbsp  130000  200000 pstrongpstrongbrstrong pPlease note this position is in Denver CO Cleerly will not sponsor a visa for this positionstrongstrongJobnbspstrongpstrongbrstrong ppstrongDescriptionstrong ppstrongnbspstrong ppWere Cleerly a healthcare company based in Denver Colorado and New York New York thats revolutionizing how heart disease is diagnosed treated and tracked We were founded 3 years ago by one of the leading cardiologists in the world and are a worldclass team of engineers designers product managers and data scientists backed by leading healthcare VCs ppWe have an immediate opening for a Stafflevel Data Science leader to drive our machine learning strategy and development process Were searching for someone excited to work on novel technologies and develop the next generation of quantitative computer aided diagnosis systems Are you an experienced data scientist with an excellent academic background  Do you have a passion for image analysis and deep learning  Have you shipped production models in a commercial setting ppbr ppIf the answer to these is yes then wed like to talk with you pstrongpstrongbrstrong pWhat would I be doingstrongpnbsp ppYoull be working in a multidisciplinary crossfunctional team to research analyze and build our ML algorithms and pipeline Youll work with other engineers to build a culture and approach focused on MLOps strategies On any given day you could be ppnbsp pulliResearching new methods of measuring and analyzing large and highly complicated data sets liliWorking with distinguished clinical researchers worldwide to validate new technologies liliDeveloping a new algorithm for image analysis liliTraining and validating your imagebased models for medical applications liliBuilding prototypes for experimentation liliPresenting findings and recommendations to groups of clinical experts and other stakeholders liliDesigning the software interface for a model to deliver it into production liliCreating annotation solutions for 2D and 3D image labeling  liliStaying abreast of current and novel developments in the field through reading conferences and other research opportunities nbsp liulstrongpstrongbrstrong pQualificationsstrongpnbsp pulliPhD in an area of computational sciences and deep knowledge of the physics of image formation lili2 or more years of commercial experience in deep learning liliStrong theoretical and practical background in image science applied mathematics machine learning deep learning liliSignificant experience with largescale machine learning platforms such as PyTorch or TensorFlow liliStrong skills with your programming language of choice such as Python Julia or R to access large amounts of data execute multiple analysis steps visualize intermediate and final results liliDemonstrated ability of prototype development liliExpertise in advanced data analytics including structured amp unstructured data data mining and ML techniques liliAbility to communicate complex concepts to both scientists and nonscientists liliA teamoriented individual that works collaboratively to achieve team goals liliAbility to exercise discretion and tact and protect confidentiality where required liulstrongpstrongbrstrong pImpress us morestrongulliExpertise in medical intelligence medical imaging and data processing liliExperience in health care education or research fields liliExperience with development of DICOM and enduser imagebased software liliPublished machine learning papers in top CS and medical journals liulpbr ppCleerly offers competitive benefits including medical dental and life insurance generous PTO stock options and 401K ppnbsp ppstrongemOUR COMPANY IS AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYERemstrongemnbsp We do not discriminate on the basis of race color national origin ancestry citizenship status protected veteran status
